generated_description: bentley's fishing adventures is a fishing guide service based in maple ridge, british columbia. the company specializes in sturgeon and salmon fishing in the greater vancouver regional district and fraser valley. they offer guided fishing trips on various rivers, including vedder, chilliwack, squamish, pitt, harrison, and fraser rivers, catering to all ages and experience levels. in addition to traditional fishing, they provide single-hand fly casting and spey casting lessons. bentley's fishing adventures emphasizes safety and offers all necessary equipment for their trips. they also offer free fishing for children under 16 when accompanied by an adult.
